Summary:毕加索原来可以这样看

16 Mar 2014 - Beijing

毕加索原来可以这样看

ISBN: 7508639928 READ: 2014-03-13 RATING: 7/10

Picasso-狂野的西班牙公牛

他激情，多变，任性，一生创造了大量的作品，极富创意，表现力，感染力。

真是个令人着迷的人。

推荐Slideshare上的Produce Like Picasso

Something Picasso:

"The only defference between flying and falling is that falling has a more permanent destination."

"Learn the rules like a pro,so you can break them like an artist."

"Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life."

"Every child is an artist.The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up."

"My mother said to me,'If you are a soldier,you will become a general.If you are a monk,you will become athe Pope.'Instead,I was a painter,and became Picasso"

"Good artists copy,great artists steal."

"It took me four years to paint like Raphael,but a lifetime to paint like a child."

"Inspiration exists,but it has to find us working."

第一部分 创作鬼才

01.图像与形态的神奇创造者

02.以厄洛斯之名

03.创作空间

第二部分 作品赏析

如何使用作品赏析？

01.《塞莱斯蒂娜》

La Celestina,1903

02.《阿维农少女》

Les Demoiselles d'Avignon,1907

03.《陈年老酒瓶、玻璃杯和报纸》

LA BOUTEILLE DE VIEUX MARC,1913

04.《排笛》

Pan's flute,1923

05.《舞蹈》

La Danse,1925

06.《玛丽- 特里斯肖像》

Portrait of Marie-Thérèse Walter,1937

07.《格尔尼卡》

Guernica,1937

08.《生命之悦》

Joie De Vivire,1946

09.《跳绳的小姑娘》

PETITE FILLE SAUTANT À LA CORDE,1950

10.《自画像》

Self-portrait Facing Death,1972
